name: Ecosystems
description:
Loveable Music Making Creatures

This is an early work-in -progress, and a long-gestating idea.   Planned goal is to have a kind of modular synthesizer, but with organisms instead of instruments.

currently we have 🐍 and 🕷️ in the mix, with limited 🐍 -> 🕷️ energy flow

planned roadmap:

🕷️ ->🐍 energy flow, with a "patching" visuals mode 

adding 🌱

energy flow between 3 species, with multiple patching options

midi in/out

stretch goals: more species, iOS/android versions, Linux support

If you play, please send me some feedback on it!

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeK2v9qfYUrgx1I-7-AXDiZ3vmR51JHOWhUOXGH...
